detaileddescription.para: Drop manifest file cache object for a FileIO if exists.
Returns a CloseableIterable of file paths in the ManifestFile.
Returns a new ManifestReader for a ManifestFile.

Note: Callers should use ManifestFiles#read(ManifestFile, FileIO, Map) to ensure the schema used by filters is the latest table schema. This should be used only when reading a manifest without filters.

memberdef.name: read

detaileddescription.para: Returns a new ManifestReader for a ManifestFile.

parameterdescription.para: a Map from spec ID to partition spec

detaileddescription.para: Manifests created by this writer have all entry snapshot IDs set to null. All entries will inherit the snapshot ID that will be assigned to the manifest on commit.

parameterdescription.para: PartitionSpec used to produce DataFile partition tuples

memberdef.argsstring: (int formatVersion, PartitionSpec spec, OutputFile outputFile, Long snapshotId)
